name: ScatterCube
description: receives the number of elements and three list of positions for a scatterplot with 3 dimensions.

params.name: count
params.description: The number of elements to draw. Used if no position arrays are defined or if it have different lengths

params.name: size
params.description: Array with the sizes for each elements or a Number to define tha same size for all elements. (1-4). WARNING! The size Array for the type 1 (squares) is not working yet!

params.name: ColorArray
params.description:
Strings array or Arrays array with the list of colors for each element. 

			Or Array with three expressions, each one to define the red, green and blue values of each point.
			These expressions can use the following variables:
			x → x pos of the point(-1 to 1) |
			y → y pos of the point(-1 to 1) |
			z → z pos of the point(-1 to 1) |
			i → index of the element

params.name: listX
params.description: Array with the x positions of the points

params.name: listY
params.description: Array with the y positions of the points

params.name: listZ
params.description: Array with the z positions of the points
